channel.title: How can u make a NPC agressive + make it actually deal damage?
channel.description:
I added a Corporal Beast to my server, and it isn't agressive and it always hit 0's against you. So can anyone help me with this?
Thank you very much.

item.title: How can u make a NPC agressive + make it actually deal damage?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Xaryza:

I followed all the steps, give it a max damage of 90, even a 400 ratio.

I had a feeling that would happen, for some reason, it doesnt work on some npcs on some servers, not sure why, but on some servers, it works on all npcs, on some, it works on only some npcs, not sure why.

Read full topic

item.title: How can u make a NPC agressive + make it actually deal damage?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

If its delta, go to npchandler class and look for a boolean called

public boolean npcGetsAnnoyed(int Npc) {

Under you should see stuff like

case 2745:

So its simple, that case is basically saying, this npc, in this case jad, is aggressive, so just add one of these like this:

case ####

add this to that boolean and replace those #s with your npc id, as for dealing damage, heres what you want:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

I could just explain it here, but i would get flamed for it, because i learned here, so best to just put this here, remember this is all delta what ive been explaining

Read full topic

item.title: How can u make a NPC agressive + make it actually deal damage?
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

[quote=“Kaex, post:2, topic:375112”]Depends on base

           Try npc.cfg
      } else {
           CombatAssistant.java
      } else {
           Spawn.cfg[/quote]

Wtf dude? xD

If u use delta go to Npchandler.java

Then search a npc in your server that hits and is agressive and just search for his id and copy the same with your npc id under it.

Youridudock
